00033 class MultiDevice : public Device
00034 {
00035 public:
00036     struct SubDevice {
00037         SubDevice(Device *device_)
00038         : device(device_) {}
00039 
00040         Device *device;
00041         map<device_ptr, device_ptr> ptr_map;
00042     };
00043 
00044     list<SubDevice> devices;
00045     device_ptr unique_ptr;
00046 
00047     MultiDevice(DeviceInfo& info, bool background_)
00048     : unique_ptr(1)
00049     {
00050         Device *device;
00051         background = background_;
00052 
00053         foreach(DeviceInfo& subinfo, info.multi_devices) {
00054             device = Device::create(subinfo, background);
00055             devices.push_back(SubDevice(device));
00056         }
00057 
00058 #if 0 //def WITH_NETWORK
00059         /* try to add network devices */
00060         ServerDiscovery discovery(true);
00061         time_sleep(1.0);
00062 
00063         list<string> servers = discovery.get_server_list();
00064 
00065         foreach(string& server, servers) {
00066             device = device_network_create(info, server.c_str());
00067             if(device)
00068                 devices.push_back(SubDevice(device));
00069         }
00070 #endif
00071     }
00072 
00073     ~MultiDevice()
00074     {
00075         foreach(SubDevice& sub, devices)
00076             delete sub.device;
00077     }
00078 
00079     const string& error_message()
00080     {
00081         foreach(SubDevice& sub, devices) {
00082             if(sub.device->error_message() != "") {
00083                 if(error_msg == "")
00084                     error_msg = sub.device->error_message();
00085                 break;
00086             }
00087         }
00088 
00089         return error_msg;
00090     }
00091 
00092     bool load_kernels(bool experimental)
00093     {
00094         foreach(SubDevice& sub, devices)
00095             if(!sub.device->load_kernels(experimental))
00096                 return false;
00097 
00098         return true;
00099     }
00100 
00101     void mem_alloc(device_memory& mem, MemoryType type)
00102     {
00103         foreach(SubDevice& sub, devices) {
00104             mem.device_pointer = 0;
00105             sub.device->mem_alloc(mem, type);
00106             sub.ptr_map[unique_ptr] = mem.device_pointer;
00107         }
00108 
00109         mem.device_pointer = unique_ptr++;
00110     }
00111 
00112     void mem_copy_to(device_memory& mem)
00113     {
00114         device_ptr tmp = mem.device_pointer;
00115 
00116         foreach(SubDevice& sub, devices) {
00117             mem.device_pointer = sub.ptr_map[tmp];
00118             sub.device->mem_copy_to(mem);
00119         }
00120 
00121         mem.device_pointer = tmp;
00122     }
00123 
00124     void mem_copy_from(device_memory& mem, int y, int w, int h, int elem)
00125     {
00126         device_ptr tmp = mem.device_pointer;
00127         int i = 0, sub_h = h/devices.size();
00128 
00129         foreach(SubDevice& sub, devices) {
00130             int sy = y + i*sub_h;
00131             int sh = (i == (int)devices.size() - 1)? h - sub_h*i: sub_h;
00132 
00133             mem.device_pointer = sub.ptr_map[tmp];
00134             sub.device->mem_copy_from(mem, sy, w, sh, elem);
00135             i++;
00136         }
00137 
00138         mem.device_pointer = tmp;
00139     }
00140 
00141     void mem_zero(device_memory& mem)
00142     {
00143         device_ptr tmp = mem.device_pointer;
00144 
00145         foreach(SubDevice& sub, devices) {
00146             mem.device_pointer = sub.ptr_map[tmp];
00147             sub.device->mem_zero(mem);
00148         }
00149 
00150         mem.device_pointer = tmp;
00151     }
00152 
00153     void mem_free(device_memory& mem)
00154     {
00155         device_ptr tmp = mem.device_pointer;
00156 
00157         foreach(SubDevice& sub, devices) {
00158             mem.device_pointer = sub.ptr_map[tmp];
00159             sub.device->mem_free(mem);
00160             sub.ptr_map.erase(sub.ptr_map.find(tmp));
00161         }
00162 
00163         mem.device_pointer = 0;
00164     }
00165 
00166     void const_copy_to(const char *name, void *host, size_t size)
00167     {
00168         foreach(SubDevice& sub, devices)
00169             sub.device->const_copy_to(name, host, size);
00170     }
00171 
00172     void tex_alloc(const char *name, device_memory& mem, bool interpolation, bool periodic)
00173     {
00174         foreach(SubDevice& sub, devices) {
00175             mem.device_pointer = 0;
00176             sub.device->tex_alloc(name, mem, interpolation, periodic);
00177             sub.ptr_map[unique_ptr] = mem.device_pointer;
00178         }
00179 
00180         mem.device_pointer = unique_ptr++;
00181     }
00182 
00183     void tex_free(device_memory& mem)
00184     {
00185         device_ptr tmp = mem.device_pointer;
00186 
00187         foreach(SubDevice& sub, devices) {
00188             mem.device_pointer = sub.ptr_map[tmp];
00189             sub.device->tex_free(mem);
00190             sub.ptr_map.erase(sub.ptr_map.find(tmp));
00191         }
00192 
00193         mem.device_pointer = 0;
00194     }

00201             sub.ptr_map[unique_ptr] = mem.device_pointer;
00202         }
00203 
00204         mem.device_pointer = unique_ptr++;

00207     void pixels_free(device_memory& mem)
00208     {
00209         device_ptr tmp = mem.device_pointer;
00210 
00211         foreach(SubDevice& sub, devices) {
00212             mem.device_pointer = sub.ptr_map[tmp];

00214             sub.ptr_map.erase(sub.ptr_map.find(tmp));
00215         }

00220     void pixels_copy_from(device_memory& mem, int y, int w, int h)
00221     {
00222         device_ptr tmp = mem.device_pointer;
00223         int i = 0, sub_h = h/devices.size();
00224 
00225         foreach(SubDevice& sub, devices) {
00226             int sy = y + i*sub_h;
00227             int sh = (i == (int)devices.size() - 1)? h - sub_h*i: sub_h;
00228 
00229             mem.device_pointer = sub.ptr_map[tmp];
00230             sub.device->pixels_copy_from(mem, sy, w, sh);
00231             i++;
00232         }
00233 
00234         mem.device_pointer = tmp;
00235     }
00236 
00237     void draw_pixels(device_memory& rgba, int y, int w, int h, int dy, int width, int height, bool transparent)
00238     {
00239         device_ptr tmp = rgba.device_pointer;
00240         int i = 0, sub_h = h/devices.size();
00241         int sub_height = height/devices.size();
00242 
00243         foreach(SubDevice& sub, devices) {
00244             int sy = y + i*sub_h;
00245             int sh = (i == (int)devices.size() - 1)? h - sub_h*i: sub_h;
00246             int sheight = (i == (int)devices.size() - 1)? height - sub_height*i: sub_height;
00247             int sdy = dy + i*sub_height;
00248             /* adjust math for w/width */
00249 
00250             rgba.device_pointer = sub.ptr_map[tmp];
00251             sub.device->draw_pixels(rgba, sy, w, sh, sdy, width, sheight, transparent);
00252             i++;
00253         }
00254 
00255         rgba.device_pointer = tmp;
00256     }
00257 
00258     void task_add(DeviceTask& task)
00259     {
00260         ThreadQueue<DeviceTask> tasks;
00261         task.split(tasks, devices.size());
00262 
00263         foreach(SubDevice& sub, devices) {
00264             DeviceTask subtask;
00265 
00266             if(tasks.worker_wait_pop(subtask)) {
00267                 if(task.buffer) subtask.buffer = sub.ptr_map[task.buffer];
00268                 if(task.rng_state) subtask.rng_state = sub.ptr_map[task.rng_state];
00269                 if(task.rgba) subtask.rgba = sub.ptr_map[task.rgba];
00270                 if(task.shader_input) subtask.shader_input = sub.ptr_map[task.shader_input];
00271                 if(task.shader_output) subtask.shader_output = sub.ptr_map[task.shader_output];
00272 
00273                 sub.device->task_add(subtask);
00274             }
00275         }
00276     }
00277 
00278     void task_wait()
00279     {
00280         foreach(SubDevice& sub, devices)
00281             sub.device->task_wait();
00282     }
00283 
00284     void task_cancel()
00285     {
00286         foreach(SubDevice& sub, devices)
00287             sub.device->task_cancel();
00288     }
00289 };
00290 
00291 Device *device_multi_create(DeviceInfo& info, bool background)
00292 {
00293     return new MultiDevice(info, background);
00294 }
00295 
00296 static bool device_multi_add(vector<DeviceInfo>& devices, DeviceType type, bool with_display, bool with_advanced_shading, const char *id_fmt, int num)
00297 {
00298     DeviceInfo info;
00299 
00300     /* create map to find duplicate descriptions */
00301     map<string, int> dupli_map;
00302     map<string, int>::iterator dt;
00303     int num_added = 0, num_display = 0;
00304 
00305     info.advanced_shading = with_advanced_shading;
00306 
00307     foreach(DeviceInfo& subinfo, devices) {
00308         if(subinfo.type == type) {
00309             if(subinfo.advanced_shading != info.advanced_shading)
00310                 continue;
00311             if(subinfo.display_device) {
00312                 if(with_display)
00313                     num_display++;
00314                 else
00315                     continue;
00316             }
00317 
00318             string key = subinfo.description;
00319 
00320             if(dupli_map.find(key) == dupli_map.end())
00321                 dupli_map[key] = 1;
00322             else
00323                 dupli_map[key]++;
00324 
00325             info.multi_devices.push_back(subinfo);
00326             if(subinfo.display_device)
00327                 info.display_device = true;
00328             num_added++;
00329         }
00330     }
00331 
00332     if(num_added <= 1 || (with_display && num_display == 0))
00333         return false;
00334 
00335     /* generate string */
00336     stringstream desc;
00337     vector<string> last_tokens;
00338     bool first = true;
00339 
00340     for(dt = dupli_map.begin(); dt != dupli_map.end(); dt++) {
00341         if(!first) desc << " + ";
00342         first = false;
00343 
00344         /* get name and count */
00345         string name = dt->first;
00346         int count = dt->second;
00347 
00348         /* strip common prefixes */
00349         vector<string> tokens;
00350         string_split(tokens, dt->first);
00351 
00352         if(tokens.size() > 1) {
00353             int i;
00354 
00355             for(i = 0; i < tokens.size() && i < last_tokens.size(); i++)
00356                 if(tokens[i] != last_tokens[i])
00357                     break;
00358 
00359             name = "";
00360             for(; i < tokens.size(); i++) {
00361                 name += tokens[i];
00362                 if(i != tokens.size() - 1)
00363                     name += " ";
00364             }
00365         }
00366 
00367         last_tokens = tokens;
00368 
00369         /* add */
00370         if(count > 1)
00371             desc << name << " (" << count << "x)";
00372         else
00373             desc << name;
00374     }
00375 
00376     /* add info */
00377     info.type = DEVICE_MULTI;
00378     info.description = desc.str();
00379     info.id = string_printf(id_fmt, num);
00380     info.display_device = with_display;
00381     info.num = 0;
00382 
00383     if(with_display)
00384         devices.push_back(info);
00385     else
00386         devices.insert(devices.begin(), info);
00387     
00388     return true;
00389 }
00390 
00391 void device_multi_info(vector<DeviceInfo>& devices)
00392 {
00393     int num = 0;
00394 
00395     if(!device_multi_add(devices, DEVICE_CUDA, false, true, "CUDA_MULTI_%d", num++))
00396         device_multi_add(devices, DEVICE_CUDA, false, false, "CUDA_MULTI_%d", num++);
00397     if(!device_multi_add(devices, DEVICE_CUDA, true, true, "CUDA_MULTI_%d", num++))
00398         device_multi_add(devices, DEVICE_CUDA, true, false, "CUDA_MULTI_%d", num++);
00399 
00400     num = 0;
00401     if(!device_multi_add(devices, DEVICE_OPENCL, false, true, "OPENCL_MULTI_%d", num++))
00402         device_multi_add(devices, DEVICE_OPENCL, false, false, "OPENCL_MULTI_%d", num++);
00403     if(!device_multi_add(devices, DEVICE_OPENCL, true, true, "OPENCL_MULTI_%d", num++))
00404         device_multi_add(devices, DEVICE_OPENCL, true, false, "OPENCL_MULTI_%d", num++);
00405 }
